title: BitRNG
blurb: Bitcoin-driven randomness services for cryptographic sampling and provably fair lotteries.
description: BitRNG exposes beacon and commitâ€“reveal primitives backed by Bitcoin. Entropy is derived from block headers, aggregated commitments, and SPV proofs to resist manipulation.
